heisig_chinese_memo: Throw on your top hat because working a chinese acre of rice field alone takes a long time!
heisig_constituent: furrow, top hat, rice field, brains, long time, mummy, bound up, person
heisig_story: Think of the three kinds of furrows shown here in this character - a top hat's rim, a rice field's ridges, and the wrinkles that show you've been around a long time.
koohiiStory1: Using a TOP HAT to make FURROWS in the RICE FIELD takes a LONG TIME!
koohiiStory2: A mummy tries to furrow his brow but realizes that he´s got no head - just a brain with a top-hat on it. So he furrows his brain. [trigger: furrow your brain].

humanum_short_description_en: " Mu " ancient work " Ji ", "Shu Wen": "Ji, six feet is a step, a hundred steps are a pan. From the field 𣫭 sound. Diao, the pan or from the field, ten, for a long time."
humanum_short_description: 「畝」古作「畮」，《說文》：「畮，六尺爲步，步百爲畮。从田𣫭聲。畞，畮或从田、十、久。」

畝字的基本解释

畝
mǔ
见“亩”。

畝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǔ］
［《廣韻》莫厚切，上厚，明。］
亦作“畆1”。亦作“畒1”。亦作“畞1”。亦作“畮1”。“亩1”的繁体字。
(1)我国地积单位，市亩的通称。周制，六尺为步（或曰六尺四寸、八尺），百步为亩。秦时以五尺为步，二百四十步为亩。汉因秦制。唐以广一步，长二百四十步为亩。清以五方尺为步，二百四十步为亩。今一亩等于六十平方丈，合6.6667公亩。
(2)田垄，田中高处。
(3)泛指农田，田地。
(4)通“母”。本源。

畝字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畝； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页761第14
〔古文〕?【唐韻】莫厚切【集韻】【韻會】莫後切，?謀上聲。司馬法，六尺爲步，步百爲畝。泰孝公制，二百四十步爲畝。宋程頤曰：古者百畝，止當今之四十畝。今之百畝，當古之二百五十畝。【書·盤庚】惰農自安，不昬作勞，不服田畝。【詩·小雅】南東其畝。【朱註】畝，壟也。　又丘名。【爾雅·釋地】如畝畝丘。【註】丘有隴界，如田畝。【釋名】畝丘，丘體滿一畝之地也。【詩·小雅】楊園之道，猗于畝丘。【傳】畝丘，丘名。　又地名。【左傳·桓二年】晉?侯之夫人姜氏，以條之役生太子，命之曰仇。其弟以千畝之戰生，命之曰成師。【註】西河界休縣南有地，名千畝。　又【韻補】叶莫補切，模上聲。【班固·西都賦】士食舊德之名氏，農服先疇之畎畝。商循族世之所鬻，工用高曾之規矩。　又叶滿彼切，眉上聲。【詩·豳風】饁彼南畝，田畯至喜。【屈原·離騷】余旣滋蘭之九畹兮，又樹蕙之百畝。畦留夷與揭車兮，雜杜衡與芳芷。　【說文】本作畮。

考證：〔【左傳·桓二年】晉?侯之

mu
Basic explanation of words
mu
mǔ
See "Mu".
mu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǔ]
["Guang Yun" Mo thick cut, thick on top, Ming. ]
Also known as "畆1". Also known as "畒1". Also known as "畞1". Also known as "kei 1". Traditional characters for "Mu 1".
(1) my country's plot unit, the general term for city mu. In the weekly system, six feet are steps (or six feet, four inches, eight feet), and a hundred steps are acres. Qin Shi took five feet as a step and two hundred and forty steps as a mu. The Han Dynasty was made by the Qin Dynasty. Tang Yiguang one step, two hundred and forty steps long is an acre. The Qing Dynasty takes five square feet as the step, and two hundred and forty steps as the mu. Today one mu is equal to sixty square feet, or 6.6667 ares.
(2) Tianlong, Tianzhong high place.
(3) Refers to farmland and fields in general.
(4) Through "mother". origin.
mu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　 Mu; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 761 14
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Mo Houche [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Do not cut back,? Seek up sound. In Sima method, six feet is a step, and a hundred steps are acres. Tai Xiao metric system, two hundred and forty steps per acre. Song Chengyi said: The ancient one hundred acres, but the present 40 acres. Hundred acres today, 250 acres in ancient times. 【Book·Pangeng】Idle farmers are at peace, do not work hard, and refuse to accept the acres. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Its acres in the south and east. [Zhu Note] Mu, ridge also.　Also the name of the hill. 【Erya·Shidi】Like acres of hills. [Note] The hills have a long boundary, like fields. [Release name] A mu of hills, the mound is full of a mu of land. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The way of Yang Yuan is based on acres of hills. [Biography] Mu hill, hill name.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Er Nian] The wife of Jin Hou, Jiang, gave birth to the prince in the battle of Tiao, and the fate is called enmity. His brother was born in a battle of thousands of acres, and his fate is said to become a teacher. [Note] There is land in the south of Xiu County, Xihejie, with a name of one thousand mu.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Mo fills up and cuts, and the voice is on the mold. [Bangu·Xidu Fu] Shishijiufu is the name of Shishijiu, and the farming uniform is the first of the 10,000 acres. The Shang Xun family is the place of the family, and the work is based on the rules of the high Zeng.　 Ye Man Biqie again, eyebrows raised. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Fu Bi Nanmu, Tian Qi is very happy. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】Yu Yangzi's ninth haze, and another hundred acres of trees. Qiliuyi and Jiechexi, mixed with Du Heng and Fangzhi.　【Said the text】This is a skip. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Huan Ernian] Jin? Hou Zhi
